hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Man in Green's House#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Fire Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #7# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
